comments.title: We provide a 3 month 3,000 mile AMC Powertrain Warranty which is included in the purchase price of vehicles -although some vehicles are excluded from the AMC Powertrain Warranty-. We also offer extended warranties which may be purchased on vehicles.
Our cars go through an extensive 27 point inspection. We make sure our vehicles are running properly before we sell them. We are very serious about safety.
Garage kept, no dents dings or scratches, Service Records Available, Well maintained and Dealer Serviced.
Autocheck Reports and Carfax Reports Available.
We specalize in 1 owner used Honda, Toyota, Acura, Lexus and Nissan.
